registerUser(ModelWrap) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.HomeController
This method returns the response message which shows whether the user has successfully registered or not.
resetPassword(Password) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.ForgotPasswordController
This method helps in fetching the token from the database and sends an error if token is not present in the database.
reverseUpvote(String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.services.UpvotesService
Deletes an existing Upvotes object that is made by a particular User on a given Proposal according to the specified Request Body String containing the following: id value of the Proposal on which an existing Upvote has to be deleted, id of the User who has made an Upvote on the given Proposal and,
reverseupvoteProposal(String) - Method in class com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.UpvotesController
This is a method used to dislike a proposal in a String which is sent in a Response Entity.
